```Python
def transform(sequence):
    non_zero_chars = set(sequence) - set("0")
    for ch in non_zero_chars:
        first_index = sequence.index(ch)
        last_index = sequence.rindex(ch)
        sequence = sequence[:first_index + 1] + "0" * (last_index - first_index - 1) + sequence[last_index:]
    return sequence
```
